HTMLAttributesElementtiming.summary: The elementtiming attribute is used to indicate that an element is flagged for tracking by objects using the "element" type. For more details, see the interface.

remarks.para: This attribute may be applied to img, {{SVGElement("image")}} elements inside an {{SVGElement("svg")}}, poster images of video elements, elements which have a {{cssxref("background-image")}}, and elements containing text nodes, such as a p.
In the DOM, this attribute is reflected as .
